        public Runtime.Watcher()

    • Method Detail

      • raise

        public void raise(Exception t)

      • await

        public void await()
        Wait for job to complete. Block calling thread if not an X10 thread. Rethrow MultipleException collected by root finish for the job if any. May be called multiple times by a unique thread.

      • await

        public void await(Long timeout)
        Wait for job to complete with a timeout. Block calling thread if not an X10 thread. Rethrow MultipleException collected by root finish for the job if any. May be called multiple times by a unique thread.

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
        Request cooperative cancellation of job. Non-blocking. Not implemented (TODO).
